feels.name: Annoyance
feels.quote: Oh, mother, what rubbish you talk! Of course I'm not tired of Windy Corner.

feels.name: Disappointment
feels.quote: She sank back. The carriage stopped at the Rectory. She got out to call for Miss Bartlett. So the Emersons had gone, and all this bother about Greece had been unnecessary. Waste!

feels.name: Confusion
feels.quote: Not a word would come to her lips. George she had faced, and could have faced again, but she had forgotten how to treat his father.

feels.name: Regret
feels.quote: Feeling a little steadier, she put the book back and turned round to him. His face was drooping and swollen, but his eyes, though they were sunken deep, gleamed with a childâ€™s courage.

feels.name: Remorse
feels.quote: He quavered: 'But you must not scold him.'

feels.name: Sorrow
feels.quote: 'Miss Honeychurch, dear, we are so sorry! George is so sorry!'

feels.name: Regret
feels.quote: 'I taught him,' he quavered, 'to trust in love.'

Places.name: Carriage
Places.description: In the carriage on the way to Dorking Station.

Places.name: Rectory
Places.description: At the Rectory where Lucy went to call for Miss Bartlett.

Places.name: Mr_Beebe_s_Study
Places.description: In Mr. Beebe's study at the Rectory.
